dict.acceptation: 乙醇，酒精；含酒精的饮料；

sent.orig: A capillary GC method was established for determination cetyl alcohol and stearyl alcohol in cetostearyl alcohol.
sent.trans: 建立了毛细管GC法测定药用辅料十六十八醇的含量。

sent.orig: Forming factor of alcohol dependence relate to family position, economic condition, family drinking alcohol hobby.
sent.trans: 形成酒依赖的因素与家庭地位、经济状况及家庭饮酒史有关。

sent.orig: Moderate alcohol intake also a noteworthy increase in tumor blood vessels compared with no alcohol intake.
sent.trans: 适量的酒精摄入和无酒精摄入的对照组相比还有明显的肿瘤血管增生。

sent.orig: Avoid Alcohol: Alcohol is high in calories, though occasional drink is okay.
sent.trans: 避免饮酒：酒是高热量饮品，不过偶尔喝点也好。

sent.orig: Alcohol, Liquor, Beer, Wine, Soft Drinks and Non-Alcohol Drinks Liquor and Beverages.
sent.trans: 采购产品酒精，酒，啤酒，酒，清凉饮料和非酒精喝酒和饮料。
